Package com.example.gorcories

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    nodelogin
    This interface used to Use Post methods wherein User can register and login.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cart
    This Cart Extends Fragment which is used to load the cart view as a fragment .
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FlyerFragment
    This fragrment is used for loading of the image in to the imageView
    ForgotPassword  
    HomeActivity
    This Activity is used for loading the main fragment into the view.
    Ingredients
    Represents the Ingredients if receipe
    Itemadaptor
    This class acts as adapter class for items list This class extends FirestoreRecyclerAdapter
    ItemsView
    ItemsView class displays the items in the fragment when item button is clicked Initializes firebasefirestore and database reference
    MainActivity
    This MainActivity is used as Navigation Between Sign up screen and login screen.
    Orderadaptor
    This class acts as adapter class for Order list view.
    orderpojo
    Model file for Orders
    Orders
    Orders class displays the orders in the fragment when orders button is clicked.
    Profile
    This Profile fragment extends Fragment is used for loading of the Profile View
    RecyclerAdaptor
    This class acts as adapter class for cart, items view This class extends RecyclerView
    RecyclerAdaptor.ViewHolder
    This class deals with cart item data and their instances
    RetrofitClient
    This RetrofitClient class for used for connection.
    SigninActivity
    This activity is for login to the application with validation using mqsql database
    Signupactivity  
    SplashScreen
    This class Splashscreen Extends AppCompactActivity Which allow to load the activity where in it contains images, logo of the app.
    ZoomImage
    This fragrment mainly aims at zooming in and zooming out of the imageView
